Table.name: TruckInfo
Table.sql: SELECT P_JOB_NO,to_char(P_DATETIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS P_DATETIME,to_char(D_DATETIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS D_DATETIME,CAR_NUM,TRUCK_CMP,CAR_DRIVER,CAR_DRIVER_TEL,ORG_NM,DEST_NM,RMK FROM GFBLTRPK WHERE GROUP_ID='SDT' AND CMP='SD' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GFBLTRCK WHERE GFBLTRCK.GROUP_ID=GFBLTRPK.GROUP_ID AND GFBLTRCK.CMP=GFBLTRPK.CMP AND GFBLTRCK.STN=GFBLTRPK.STN AND GFBLTRCK.P_JOB_NO=GFBLTRPK.P_JOB_NO AND GFBLTRCK.ORDER_NO=':=order')>0

Table.name: Order
Table.sql: SELECT * FROM TMPOM WHERE ORDER_NO=':=order' AND ORDER_NO=':=a' AND ORDER_NO=':=b'
